name: Cryo Regisvine
desc:
A monster formed from a vine that was imbued with the essence of biting frost within the ley lines.
Some studies suggest that plants are like the organs of the world, harmonizing the turbulent elemental energies of the ley lines. Concrete examples of this phenomena are Mist Flowers, Whopperflowers, and the like, which brim over with elemental energy.
In certain circumstances, certain plants will turn into creatures of monstrous size and intent — such as the Cryo Regisvines — in the course of many years.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

dropMaterial.name: Hoarfrost Core
dropMaterial.desc:
The exposed core of a defeated Cryo Regisvine. Pure Cryo energy is contained within it.
Energy and thoughts that swell deep within the earth will eventually erupt on the surface. Even the deathly silent frost will attach to living things on the ground, turning even ordinary vegetation like vines into huge, vicious predators.

customize.text: Carnivorous plants that use the alluring appearance of their flowers to deceive their prey. Their vine-like stalks are surprisingly tough to cut through. Perhaps the organ shaped like a <color=#ffe14b>Cryo core</color> growing near their roots could be the key to defeating them...

<color=#ffd780>"Take That, You Overblown Mist Flower!"</color>
Defeat a Cryo Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Knockout</color>
Destroy a Cryo Regisvine's corolla weak point while it is performing its rotary spray attack.

customize.name: Primogem

customize.text:

Paralyze a Cryo Regisvine by attacking its corolla.
